OOC: Hey Orchid... are you going to have your preds fly down into the 
ocean vortex leading to the second infecticon facility yet? They 
aren't going to wait forever... Also note Darkfate cant recieve 
transmissions since the room hes now in is made of energy which is 
disrupting all non telepathic signals.

BIC:
The twenty five shots fired by windlord were once again countered by 
Gemini Dragons funnels, 5 of them flying up to take in five shots 
each as they enlarged. A moment later the right head of Gemini Dragon 
unleashed four fireballs at Windlord as the left head unleashed a 
freeze beam at Unitron once again. It then flapped its mighty wings 
and sped back towards the Chivtron base...

Meanwhile at the Chivtron base Zero steps into a CR chamber to have 
the damage on him repaired.

Still elsewhere, at the abnormally massive second infecticon base, 
an  unusual glow begins to fill the very center of the base where he 
Ocean floor is, suddenly millions of chaochitan nano probes are 
released from tubes all around and begin construction of something 
big... something really big... something that is apparently leading 
down into the earth. Still back inside the room begins to pulsate, 
Blacknightmare would be able to feel her body beggining to heat up as 
the Chaochitan energy built up all within it. If she did not decide 
on an answer soon the room would be so full of it it would kill her.

Misfire: "Your answer now. Or else you die."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (Don't want to freeze this battle, so I'll just keep posting and 
await 
> Rudra's resposne
> 
> Zardus: No, you're wrong, don't mock Baron Van Halen.  And 
currently the 
> Alliance Island is under attack by a single robot named Chaostaur, 
owned by 
> Rudra, but Punch is firing several autoguns on him and I am humbly 
waiting a 
> response)
> 
> Shockwave/Unitron/Sixshot/Firestarter:
> 
> 
> 
> Shockwave did some basic and advanced maneuvers, and there were 
just to many 
> shots as a dozen blasted a gaping hole in his right wing, which a 
few seconds 
> later was ripped off by the wind.  He reverted to biped mode and 
instantly 
> transformed to his ray gun mode.
> 
> As big as he was originally, this massive weapon bears upon 
Windlord, firing 
> off a powerful blast of gamma rays.  The Emperor reverted back to 
robot mode, 
> missile launcher in his single hand, his energy resources 
temporarily drained 
> from the demanding shot.
> 
> More down towards the ground was Unitron, in his tank mode, not 
fairing to 
> well.  Going at his full speed, he was able to dodge both missiles 
and all 
> but two shots from Aerotaur, but the ice blast from Gemini struck 
one of the 
> extensive armor plates that protected his treads, and a fusion 
blast tore 
> through the now greatly weakened armor there, blasting through the 
treads.
> 
> Unitron came to a dead halt, the Deceptcion warrior in great pain.  
He 
> swerved his turret, firing off two explosive shells from his large 
cannon at 
> the Maximal tank that had struck him, getting ready to go to an 
alternate 
> mode.  The mounted machine gun on his turret swivelled and fired 
off ten 
> rapid laser bolts at the Gemini who had shot at him. 
> 
> Meanwhile, back in the air, the only STAG in existance easily 
dodged the six 
> shots fired at him, coincidentally his name being Sixshot.  He 
armed a pair 
> of missiles, launching them both, each splitting apart, one heading 
for 
> Cledar and the other at Blyer.
> 
> And still in the air, for now, was Firestarter, third oldest among 
the 
> current Decepticons present at the battle.  His scanners detected 
someone 
> getting a lock on him and two incoming objects, so he barrel 
rolled, each 
> missile going by but the explosions from the shock wave rattled him 
a little, 
> a piece of shrapnel smashing a small hole through his cockpit and 
stabbing 
> into the empty seat.
> 
> "Lousy Autobots." he cursed, bringing his laser weaponry to full 
and 
> launching off twenty rapid laser bolts down at Hot Rod.
